c74object.name: nw.phasorshift~
c74object.description: Outputs phase signals like phasor~ with evenly-spaced phase relationships between the outlets. Originally created for use with grain.phase~ object, but there are other applications.

outlet.digest: Audio signal: the generated phase ramp output. Each outlet will be evenly spaced across the period.

objarg.name: num-outlets
objarg.digest: Sets the number of outlets. Defaults to minimum 2. Maximum is 64
